issue.title: Make cookies_allowlist.txt separate from the AdGuard Annoyances filter in uBlock Origin

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Please stop merging https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/AnnoyancesFilter/Cookies/sections/cookies_allowlist.txt with the AdGuard Annoyances filter used in uBlock Origin, because there is no way to disable those allow-lists. 

They just allow annoying popups appear that otherwise would not.

### Proposed solution

I would suggest separating them into 2 different lists, making the cookies_allowlists.txt filter optional.

### Additional information

_No response_
